arguments.name: token
arguments.description: Type: ULONG_PTR Token returned by a previous call to GdiplusStartup.

arguments.name: *token
arguments.description: Type: ULONG_PTR token* Pointer to a  					ULONG_PTR that receives a token. Pass the token to GdiplusShutdown when you have finished using GDI+.

arguments.name: *input
arguments.description: Type: const GdiplusStartupInput* Pointer to a GdiplusStartupInput structure that contains the GDI+ version, a pointer to a debug callback function, a Boolean value that specifies whether to suppress the background thread, and a Boolean value that specifies whether to suppress external image codecs.

arguments.name: *output
arguments.description: Type: GdiplusStartupOutput* Pointer to a GdiplusStartupOutput structure that receives a pointer to a notification hook function and a pointer to a notification unhook function. If the  					SuppressBackgroundThread data member of the  					input parameter is FALSE, then this parameter can be NULL.

arguments.name: numDecoders
arguments.description: Type: UINT Integer that specifies the number of available image decoders. Call GetImageDecodersSize to determine this number.

arguments.name: size
arguments.description: Type: UINT Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the array of  					ImageCodecInfo objects. Call GetImageDecodersSize to determine this number.

arguments.name: *decoders
arguments.description: Type: ImageCodecInfo* Pointer to a buffer that receives the array of  					ImageCodecInfo objects. You must allocate memory for this buffer. Call GetImageDecodersSize to determine the size of the required buffer.

arguments.name: *numDecoders
arguments.description: Type: UINT* Pointer to a UINT that receives the number of available image decoders.

arguments.name: *size
arguments.description: Type: UINT* Pointer to a  					UINT that receives the total size, in bytes, of the array of  					ImageCodecInfo objects that is returned by the GetImageDecoders function.

arguments.name: numEncoders
arguments.description: Type: UINT Integer that specifies the number of available image encoders. Call GetImageEncodersSize to determine this number.

arguments.name: size
arguments.description: Type: UINT Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the array of  					ImageCodecInfo objects. Call GetImageEncodersSize to determine this number.

arguments.name: *encoders
arguments.description: Type: ImageCodecInfo* Pointer to a buffer that receives the array of  					ImageCodecInfo objects. You must allocate memory for this buffer. Call GetImageEncodersSize to determine the size of the required buffer.

arguments.name: *numEncoders
arguments.description: Type: UINT* Pointer to a  					UINT that receives the number of available image encoders.

arguments.name: *size
arguments.description: Type: UINT* Pointer to a  					UINT that receives the total size, in bytes, of the array of  					ImageCodecInfo objects that is returned by GetImageEncoders.

arguments.name: pixfmt
arguments.description: Type: PixelFormat A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.

arguments.name: pixfmt
arguments.description: Type: PixelFormat A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.

arguments.name: pixfmt
arguments.description: Type: PixelFormat A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.

arguments.name: pixfmt
arguments.description: Type: PixelFormat A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.

arguments.name: pixfmt
arguments.description: Type: PixelFormat A PixelFormat constant that specifies the pixel format to be tested.

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: Type: ObjectType Element of the ObjectType enumeration to be tested.
